#summary Detects query hits and outputs summary and details for hmm protein domains.
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

This program is designed to be used with hmm_search_files. It detects and displays the number of domain match hits for the sequence query. If matches are founds, it Extracts and appends tab-delimited(Excel formatted) domain sequence summary and domain annotations into 2 separate files. Optional arguments exist for custom modification of the output file.
